title: How to View an Order
description: Learn how to view the details of an order, including items, quantities, and pricing.

title: How to Split Payment Per Item
description: Discover how to split the payment for an order based on individual items and allocate different payment methods.

title: How to Split Payment Per Guest
description: Find out how to split the payment for an order among multiple guests or diners.

title: How to Search for an Item
description: Learn the process of searching for a specific item within the ordering system to quickly locate it.

title: How to Remove an Order Item
description: Discover how to remove an unwanted or incorrect item from an order before finalizing it.

title: How to Place an Order
description: Learn the step-by-step process of placing an order, including selecting items, specifying quantities, and confirming the order.

title: How to Pay via Third-Party Options
description: Find out how to make a payment using third-party payment options, such as digital wallets or online payment platforms.

title: How to Open the Register
description: Learn how to open the cash register at the start of a shift or business day.

title: How to Manually Enter Payment
description: Discover how to manually enter a payment amount and process it without relying on automated payment methods.
